skills.title: Fullstack Development:
skills.description: Proficient in both front and backend development using PHP (Laravel), Java (Spring Boot), Python (Django, Flask), and JS (React.js, Next.js). I bring extensive experience in crafting, high-performance applications across multiple technology.

skills.title: Cloud Solutions
skills.description: Skilled in deploying and managing applications on AWS, Azure, DigitalOcean, IBM Cloud, Heroku, Linode, and Kamatera. I excel in leveraging these cloud platforms to architect scalable, high-performance solutions tailored to specific needs.

skills.title: DevOps
skills.description: Experienced in containerization with Docker and implementing CI/CD pipelines with Jenkins. I also have expertise in Kubernetes for orchestrating containerized applications, ensuring scalability and reliability across cloud environments.

skills.title: Payment Integration
skills.description: Extensive expertise in integrating payment solutions with APIs for Airtel, MTN, Zamtel, Mastercard, and Visa. I have a proven track record of implementing secure payment gateways, ensuring compliance with industry standards and regulations.

skills.title: API Development
skills.description: Strong background in designing and building RESTful APIs and working with GraphQL. Adept at creating robust, scalable RESTful APIs that adhere to best practices for performance, security, and maintainability

skills.title: Database Management
skills.description: Proficient in managing databases such as MySQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Oracle, MS SQL Server, RavenDB, Firebase, and Redis. Experienced in database programming, including PL/SQL, to develop and optimize complex queries and procedures.
